name: First (itch) (SirMerlot, Mpzrueda)
description:
What came first, the chicken or the egg?

There is only one way to know it: Going back.

Part of the Global Game Jam 2023, with "Roots" as main theme, with the "An Image worth more than 1000 words" diversifier.

Wasn't only my first global game jam but my first game I make. I understand how irresponsible was that, but still, here I am.

(My first time using Godot too)

Thanks to Paola Pimienta, María Paula Rueda and Juan Pablo Rueda for the big help they were while making this.
